Job Posting: 176688 - Position: S26 Web Applications Co-op/Intern (28482) 176688 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 01/16/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/07/2026 02:51 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Nokia Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Canada (Hybrid) 2026 - Summer S26 Web Applications Co-op/Intern (28482) 176688 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 4 months Hybrid CAD 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List $41,184 to $96,356 per year Position: Software Applications Co-op/Intern Number of Position(s): 2 Duration: 4+ Months Date: May 4 - Aug 28, 2026 (Summer Term) Location: Hybrid - Ottawa Office Education Recommendations Currently a candidate for a Master's, bachelor's degree, or diploma in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field with an accredited school in Canada. Your responsibilities As part of the team, you will: • Develop scripts or applications (e.g. XML, Java, Java Script, Perl) to simulate various management activities and network scenarios. • Develop and build network setups to facilitate feature development and testing. • Develop and execute test plans to validate functional aspects of the product. • Investigate product defects encountered during test scenarios. • Ensure regular scheduling of automated regression tests, analyze automated test results, and maintain regression scripts, regression, and performance test beds. Job Requirements Your skills and experience Required Skills for Internal Candidates: • Strong programming skills (Java, Java Script, Perl, XML) • Ability to learn quickly and to work in a fast-paced, innovative environment. • Strong problem-resolution skills It would be nice if you also had: • UNIX operating environment (RHEL or Solaris), Virtual Machines, Kubernetes • Knowledge of software and/or testing methodologies • Networking and telecommunications knowledge Understanding of L2/L3 Services, Routing Protocols (ie. OSPF, IS-IS, BGP, RIP), and MPLS • N/A Citizenship Requirement Position Start Date Position End Date May 04, 2026 12:00 AM August 28, 2026 12:00 AM APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required?
